com.google.android.glass.TMM

Class CardLoaderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.google.android.glass.TMM.CardLoaderService

  • public class CardLoaderService
extends Service
    The Class CardLoaderService. This is an android service that manages the loading/synchronization of the cards and their databases. It is also responsible for alerting the system

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG
        The Constant TAG. Used for the Android debug logger.

      • app

        private TellMeMoreApplication app
        A reference to the parent application. This is used primarily to access the DB of cards.

      • TARGET_SERVER_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String TARGET_SERVER_KEY
        The Constant TARGET_SERVER_KEY. This is used for retrieving intent data, specifically the name of the DB to synchronize.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXAMPLE_CARD_SERVER

        public static final java.lang.String EXAMPLE_CARD_SERVER
        The Constant EXAMPLE_CARD_SERVER. This is our default server to use if there is no QR code available.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        private java.lang.String targetServer
        The target server name (this will be synchronized).

      • onStartCommand

        public int onStartCommand(Intent intent,
                          int flags,
                          int startId)

      • broadcastCardsLoaded

        public void broadcastCardsLoaded(Context context,
                                 java.lang.String serverName)
        Broadcast cards loaded. Use this to broadcast to the system when the cards are loaded.
        Parameters:
        context - The service context to use for the intent broadcast.
        serverName - The name of the synchronized server to include in the intent.

        public IBinder onBind(Intent arg0)
